tweet.text: 🎉 October 2021 marks the 30th anniversary of the #FRUS public law, 100 years of @HistoryAtState, and 160 years of FRUS! To celebrate, we’re highlighting some of our favorite documents. To join in, tweet your favorites with #FavoriteFRUS Explore #FRUS: https://t.co/8tC9BPPMB2 https://t.co/mkUIepixCJ
